string-array.name: anger_actions
string-array.item: Take multiple deep breaths, you got this, all is going to be OK!
Before doing anything count to 10 slowly, no need to rush things!
Lightening up can help diffuse tension. Use humor to help you face what\'s making you angry

Talk to your friends and family.
Anxiety is a future-oriented state of mind, reel yourself back to the present.
